com.fluidops.ajax.components

Class FForm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FComponent
      • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FContainer
        • com.fluidops.ajax.components.FForm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FEventListener

    public class FForm
extends FContainer
    Represents a html form element
    Author:
    hv

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FForm.AsciiPrintableValidator
      checks if a field is not empty and does only contain ascii printable characters
      static class  FForm.BooleanValidator 
      static class  FForm.CellValidator
      Check if input string is a cellphone number
      static class  FForm.DateVal
      checks for a valid date
      static class  FForm.EmailPatternValidator
      Only allows emails which match a specific pattern
      static class  FForm.EmailValidator
      email validator checks for valid eMail addresses also supports IDN-domains
      static class  FForm.EmptyOrNestedValidator
      Validates successfully if component is empty or if if the FForm.EmptyOrNestedValidator.nested succeeds.
      static class  FForm.FloatValidator
      float validator checks for floats
      class  FForm.FormData
      struct for transmitting the information from the form to the form handler
      static class  FForm.FormHandler
      Interface of a form handler implementation defines what happens on form events
      static class  FForm.LongValidator
      long validator checks for longs
      static class  FForm.NoCommaValidator
      Checks that the returnValue is not null, not empty and does not contain commas
      static class  FForm.NoOperationFormHandler
      Form Handler which does nothing
      static class  FForm.NotEmptyAndNestedValidator
      Validates successfully if both FForm.NotEmptyValidator and the FForm.NotEmptyAndNestedValidator.nested succeed.
      static class  FForm.NotEmptyValidator
      checks if a field is not empty
      static class  FForm.NumberValidator
      number validator checks for integers
      static class  FForm.PosNumberNullValidator
      number validator checks or integers must be a positive not 0 number
      static class  FForm.PosNumberValidator
      number validator checks or integers must be a positive not 0 number
      static class  FForm.RegexValidator
      Match input string to given regex
      static class  FForm.URLValidator
      Check if input string is valid URL
      static class  FForm.Validation
      validation possibilities
      static interface  FForm.Validator
      the interface for all validators, also for the custom
      static class  FForm.VoidValidator
      void validator (doesn't check the input)
